entry.title: Why Ubuntu (and Linux in General) Won't Take Over the Desktop
entry.content:
"As long as people can't go to a shop and buy a Dell or a HP with Linux installed, it won't become mainstream"

"For them [The average Joe] something that doesn't come in the box or from a shop just isn't real. And that's the problem"

 

From Linux Outlaws Episode 202.

entry.title: Something I Wrote: Unity, Then And Now
entry.content: For those of you who are Ubuntu users, you probably have heard of the new Ubuntu Unity interface that became the default in 11.04 Natty Narwhal. Well, people don't seem to like it, so for today's part of the wordpress post a week challenge, I wrote something over on 2buntu.com about Unity, then and now. If you're still reading this, and you're interested in it, take a look at it over here.
